title: Show implementation plan steps in TaskDetailDialog
description: Display the AI-generated implementation plan with step status in the task detail dialog.
definitionOfDone: Dialog shows implementation steps in a list
Each step shows description, status, affected files
Steps with COMPLETED status show checkmark
taskRails: Use JBList or JPanel with BoxLayout for step list
